# Interactive tools and resources for applied veterinary epidemiology

This site is maintained by [Javier Guitian](https://www.rvc.ac.uk/about/our-people/javier-guitian) to share interactive apps and other resources for teaching, training, and use by animal health professionals. Additional materials may be added here over time.
